original_title: Sri Lanka to appoint authorised agents for online tourist visa applications
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will appoint GBS Technology Services, IVS Global, and VFS Global as authorised agents for online visa applications for foreigners visiting Sri Lanka.
“An authorised agent will enable tourists coming to Sri Lanka to apply for visa online more efficiently,” Cabinet spokesman minister Bandula Gunawardena said on Tuesday (12).
The selected companies work with governments globally to provide websites and services for travellers to easily and securely apply for visa services.
Outsourcing the cisa application process reduces wait times for travellers and administrative work for embassies.
For Embassies/Consulates, it means less crowded consulates, cost efficiencies, and the ability to focus on the essential decision-making stage of the visa process.
Sri Lanka welcomed 151,496 tourists in November 2023, up 153 percent from a year earlier, and is expecting around 1.5 million visitors in 2023. (Colombo/Dec12/2023)
